core_meaning: Sextile between Jupiter and Pluto opens opportunity/skill. Jupiter: growth, wisdom, mentor, law, faith, abundance. Pluto: . General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

facets.career: Mentorship, promotions, strategic expansion.  Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.relationships: Goodwill, generosity, shared purpose.  Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.money: Scaling revenue, windfalls, ethical growth.  Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.health_adj: Liver, metabolic balance; avoid excess.  Emphasis: opportunity/skill.

risk_notes: Complacency or overextension; assuming goodwill covers weak execution.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Pluto: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Pluto: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Pluto: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Pluto: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Pluto: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Pluto: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

en.title: Jupiter Sextile Pluto
en.core: Sextile between Jupiter and Pluto opens opportunity/skill. Jupiter: growth, wisdom, mentor, law, faith, abundance. Pluto: . General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

hi.title: Jupiter Sextile Pluto (हिन्दी)
hi.core: Jupiter और Pluto का Sextile — ऊर्जा opportunity/skill के रूप में चलती है. थोड़ा संतुलन रखें; अवसर और सीख दोनों मिलेंगे.
